data.title: Nobel Prize in Physics: Complete List of Winners from 1901 to 2022
data.meta_description: Nobel Prize in Physics is given by the Royal Swedish Academy of Scientists. The Nobel Prize is given to those who have made outstanding contributions to humankind in the field of physics.
